thread.title: Ronda Rousey on Justin Bieber: He wasn't nice to my sister
thread.title_full: Ronda Rousey on Justin Bieber: He wasn't nice to my sister | Fox News

author: New York Post
title: Ronda Rousey on Justin Bieber: He wasn't nice to my sister
text:
Published October 09, 2015 New York Post Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print
Ronda Rousey is no longer a Belieber.
“ Justin Bieber was actually really rude to my little sister at the Cannes Film Festival ,” she told Cosmopolitan during a UFC promotional media tour.
The UFC fighter says Bieber was “taking some pictures with some ladies and [my sister] suddenly got really excited and was like, ‘Do you think he’d want to take with me? Do you think he’d want to?’ I was like ‘Sure, Julia, don’t worry about it. Everyone’s taking pictures today. Don’t feel bad at all. You know, that’s why everybody is here.'”
PHOTOS: Ronda Rousey relaxes at the beach with friends
Rousey, 28, headed over to Bieber but didn’t quite get the response she was hoping for.
“I walked over there, I said, ‘Excuse me,’ and he turned to me and goes, ‘I’ve already taken a billion pictures today, OK?’ And I said, ‘Yeah, but,’ cause she’s the only 16-year-old girl at the whole party, you know? I only got a ‘Yeah, but’ out and he goes, ‘A billion,’ and walks off and totally snubbed my little sister.”
According to Rousey, young Julia was on the verge of tears when she said, “I’m no longer a Belieber.” Well, neither is Rousey after the exchange.
“Yeah, I don’t think I’d want to hang out with him,” she said.
This article originally appeared in the New York Post 's Page Six .
